text: Arthur Bailey (11 January 1911 – 2006) was an English footballer who played as an inside left for Chapel-en-le-Frith, Manchester North End, Oldham Athletic, and Stalybridge Celtic. ==Playing career== Bailey played for Chapel-en-le- Frith, Manchester North End, Oldham Athletic (in two spells), and Stalybridge Celtic. During World War II he played as a guest for Wolverhampton Wanderers, Manchester United, Blackpool, Rochdale, the Royal Air Force, and Port Vale. ==Statistics== Source: {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !rowspan="2"|Division !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|FA Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="4"|Oldham Athletic |1933–34||Second Division||27||7||3||2||0||0||30||9 |- |1934–35||Second Division||24||2||1||0||0||0||25||2 |- |1935–36||Third Division North||2||2||0||0||0||0||2||2 |- !colspan="2"|Total !53!!11!!4!!2!!0!!0!!57!!13 |- |Oldham Athletic |1939–40||–||0||0||0||0||1||0||1||0 |} ==References== Category:1914 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Footballers from Manchester Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Manchester North End F.C. players Category:Oldham Athletic A.F.C. players Category:Stalybridge Celtic F.C. players Category:Wolverhampton Wanderers F.C. wartime guest players Category:Manchester United F.C. wartime guest players Category:Blackpool F.C. wartime guest players Category:Rochdale A.F.C. wartime guest players Category:Port Vale F.C. wartime guest players Category:Shrewsbury Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
